trans-unit.source: Constructs an unsigned-short based DataBuffer with a single bank using the specified array, size, and offset.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的数组，大小和偏移量，使用单个存储区构造一个基于unsigned-short的 DataBuffer 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an unsigned-short based DataBuffer with a single bank using the specified array, size, and offset. dataArray must have at least offset + size elements. Only elements offset through offset + size - 1 should be used by accessors of this DataBuffer.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的数组，大小和偏移量，使用单个存储区构造一个基于unsigned-short的 DataBuffer 。 dataArray 必须至少具有 offset + size 元素。只有元件 offset 通过 offset + size - 1应当由本的访问器中使用 DataBuffer 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an unsigned-short based DataBuffer with a single bank using the specified array.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的数组使用单个存储区构造一个基于unsigned-short的 DataBuffer 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an unsigned-short based DataBuffer with a single bank using the specified array. Only the first size elements should be used by accessors of this DataBuffer. dataArray must be large enough to hold size elements.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的数组使用单个存储区构造一个基于unsigned-short的 DataBuffer 。此 DataBuffer 的访问器应仅使用前 size 元素。 dataArray 必须足够大以容纳 size 元素。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an unsigned-short based DataBuffer with specified arrays, size, and offsets.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的数组，大小和偏移量构造一个基于unsigned-short的 DataBuffer 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an unsigned-short based DataBuffer with specified arrays, size, and offsets. The number of banks is equal to dataArray.length. Each array must be at least as large as size + the corresponding offset. There must be an entry in the offset array for each dataArray entry. For each bank, only elements offset through offset + size - 1 should be used by accessors of this DataBuffer.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的数组，大小和偏移量构造一个基于unsigned-short的 DataBuffer 。存储体的数量等于 dataArray.length 。每个数组必须至少与 size +相应的偏移量一样大。每个 dataArray 条目的偏移量数组中都必须有一个条目。对于每一个银行，只有元件 offset 通过 offset + size - 1应当由本的访问器中使用 DataBuffer 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an unsigned-short based DataBuffer with the specified arrays.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的数组构造一个基于unsigned-short的 DataBuffer 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an unsigned-short based DataBuffer with the specified arrays. The number of banks will be equal to dataArray.length. Only the first size elements of each array should be used by accessors of this DataBuffer.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的数组构造一个基于unsigned-short的 DataBuffer 。存储体的数量将等于 dataArray.length 。此 DataBuffer 的访问器仅应使用每个数组的第一个 size 元素。

trans-unit.target: 构造一个基于unsigned-short的 DataBuffer ,具有指定数量的存储区，所有存储区均具有指定的大小。

trans-unit.source: Constructs and returns a new SplittableRandom instance that shares no mutable state with this instance. However, with very high probability, the set of values collectively generated by the two objects has the same statistical properties as if the same quantity of values were generated by a single thread using a single SplittableRandom object. Either or both of the two objects may be further split using the split() method, and the same expected statistical properties apply to the entire set of generators constructed by such recursive splitting.
trans-unit.target: 构造并返回一个新的SplittableRandom实例，该实例与此实例不共享任何可变状态。但是，由两个对象共同生成的一组值具有很高的统计属性，就好像使用单个SplittableRandom对象由单个线程生成的数量相同的值一样。可以使用 split() 方法进一步拆分两个对象中的一个或两个，并且将相同的预期统计属性应用于通过这种递归拆分构造的整个生成器集。

A user interface object such as a button or a scrollbar is called, in AWT terminology, a component. The Component class is the root of all AWT components. See Component for a detailed description of properties that all AWT components share.

trans-unit.source: Contains classes related to developing beans -- components based on the JavaBeans architecture.
trans-unit.target: 包含与开发bean有关的类-基于JavaBeans体系结构的组件。

trans-unit.source: Contains classes related to developing beans -- components based on the JavaBeans architecture. A few of the classes are used by beans while they run in an application. For example, the event classes are used by beans that fire property and vetoable change events (see PropertyChangeEvent). However, most of the classes in this package are meant to be used by a bean editor (that is, a development environment for customizing and putting together beans to create an application). In particular, these classes help the bean editor create a user interface that the user can use to customize the bean. For example, a bean may contain a property of a special type that a bean editor may not know how to handle. By using the PropertyEditor interface, a bean developer can provide an editor for this special type.
trans-unit.target: 包含与开发bean有关的类-基于JavaBeans体系结构的组件。 Bean在应用程序中运行时会使用其中的一些类。例如，触发属性和否决变更事件的bean使用事件类（请参见 PropertyChangeEvent ）。但是，此软件包中的大多数类都打算由Bean编辑器使用（即，用于自定义和放在一起以创建应用程序的Bean的开发环境）。特别地，这些类帮助Bean编辑器创建一个用户界面，用户可以使用该界面来自定义Bean。例如，bean可能包含bean编辑器可能不知道如何处理的特殊类型的属性。通过使用 PropertyEditor 界面，bean开发人员可以为这种特殊类型提供编辑器。

trans-unit.source: Contains classes related to developing beans -- components based on the JavaBeans™ architecture.
trans-unit.target: 包含与开发bean有关的类-基于JavaBeans™体系结构的组件。

trans-unit.source: Contains classes related to developing beans -- components based on the JavaBeans™ architecture. A few of the classes are used by beans while they run in an application. For example, the event classes are used by beans that fire property and vetoable change events (see PropertyChangeEvent). However, most of the classes in this package are meant to be used by a bean editor (that is, a development environment for customizing and putting together beans to create an application). In particular, these classes help the bean editor create a user interface that the user can use to customize the bean. For example, a bean may contain a property of a special type that a bean editor may not know how to handle. By using the PropertyEditor interface, a bean developer can provide an editor for this special type.
trans-unit.target: 包含与开发bean有关的类-基于JavaBeans™体系结构的组件。 Bean在应用程序中运行时会使用其中的一些类。例如，触发属性和否决变更事件的bean使用事件类（请参见 PropertyChangeEvent ）。但是，此软件包中的大多数类都打算由Bean编辑器使用（即，用于自定义和组合Bean以创建应用程序的开发环境）。特别地，这些类帮助Bean编辑器创建一个用户界面，用户可以使用该界面来自定义Bean。例如，bean可能包含bean编辑器可能不知道如何处理的特殊类型的属性。通过使用 PropertyEditor 界面，bean开发人员可以为这种特殊类型提供编辑器。

trans-unit.source: Contains interfaces and classes needed by language runtimes to implement their own language-specific object models and type conversions. The main entry point is the GuardingDynamicLinker interface. It needs to be implemented in order to provide linking for the runtime's own object model. A language runtime can have more than one guarding dynamic linker implementation. When a runtime is configuring Dynalink for itself, it will normally set these guarding linkers as the prioritized linkers in its DynamicLinkerFactory (and maybe some of them as fallback linkers, for e.g. handling "method not found" and similar errors in a language-specific manner if no other linker managed to handle the operation.)
trans-unit.target: 包含语言运行时实现其自身特定于语言的对象模型和类型转换所需的接口和类。主要入口是 GuardingDynamicLinker 接口。需要实现它以便为运行时自己的对象模型提供链接。一种语言运行时可以具有多个保护性动态链接器实现。当运行时为其自身配置Dynalink时，通常会将这些保护链接程序设置为其 DynamicLinkerFactory 中的优先链接程序（并且可能将其中一些作为后备链接程序，例如，以特定于语言的方式处理“找不到方法”和类似错误） （如果没有其他链接程序设法处理该操作。）

trans-unit.source: ContextualRenderedImageFactory provides an interface for the functionality that may differ between instances of RenderableImageOp.
trans-unit.target: ContextualRenderedImageFactory为RenderableImageOp实例之间可能不同的功能提供了一个接口。

trans-unit.source: ContextualRenderedImageFactory provides an interface for the functionality that may differ between instances of RenderableImageOp. Thus different operations on RenderableImages may be performed by a single class such as RenderedImageOp through the use of multiple instances of ContextualRenderedImageFactory. The name ContextualRenderedImageFactory is commonly shortened to "CRIF."
trans-unit.target: ContextualRenderedImageFactory为RenderableImageOp实例之间可能存在的不同功能提供了一个接口。 因此,通过使用ContextualRenderedImageFactory的多个实例,RenderedImageOp这样的单一类可以对RenderableImages进行不同的操作。ContextualRenderedImageFactory这个名字通常被缩短为 "CRIF"。

trans-unit.source: ContextualRenderedImageFactory.create() is called with a new ParameterBlock containing the parameters of the RenderableImageOp and the RenderedImages that were created by the createRendering() calls.
trans-unit.target: ContextualRenderedImageFactory.create()调用一个新的ParameterBlock,其中包含RenderableImageOp的参数和由createRendering()调用创建的RenderedImages。

trans-unit.source: ControllerEventListener.controlChange()

trans-unit.source: Controllers 64 through 95 (0x40 - 0x5F) allow 7-bit precision. The value of a 7-bit controller is set completely by the value argument. An additional set of controllers provide 14-bit precision by using two controller numbers, one for the most significant 7 bits and another for the least significant 7 bits. Controller numbers 0 through 31 (0x00 - 0x1F) control the most significant 7 bits of 14-bit controllers; controller numbers 32 through 63 (0x20 - 0x3F) control the least significant 7 bits of these controllers. For example, controller number 7 (0x07) controls the upper 7 bits of the channel volume controller, and controller number 39 (0x27) controls the lower 7 bits. The value of a 14-bit controller is determined by the interaction of the two halves. When the most significant 7 bits of a controller are set (using controller numbers 0 through 31), the lower 7 bits are automatically set to 0. The corresponding controller number for the lower 7 bits may then be used to further modulate the controller value.
trans-unit.target: 控制器64至95（0x40-0x5F）允许7位精度。7位控制器的 value 完全由该值设置争论。另一组控制器通过使用两个控制器编号来提供14位精度，其中一个用于最高有效7位，另一个用于最低有效7位。控制器编号0到31（0x00-0x1F）控制14位控制器的最高7位。控制器编号32到63（0x20-0x3F）控制这些控制器的最低有效7位。例如，控制器编号7（0x07）控制通道音量控制器的高7位，而控制器编号39（0x27）控制低7位。 14位控制器的值由两个部分的相互作用确定。设置控制器的最高7位（使用控制器编号0到31）时，低7位自动设置为0。然后，可以使用低7位的相应控制器编号来进一步调制控制器值。

trans-unit.source: Controllers 64 through 95 (0x40 - 0x5F) allow 7-bit precision. The value of a 7-bit controller is set completely by the value argument. An additional set of controllers provide 14-bit precision by using two controller numbers, one for the most significant 7 bits and another for the least significant 7 bits. Controller numbers 0 through 31 (0x00 - 0x1F) control the most significant 7 bits of 14-bit controllers; controller numbers 32 through 63 (0x20 - 0x3F) control the least significant 7 bits of these controllers. For example, controller number 7 (0x07) controls the upper 7 bits of the channel volume controller, and controller number 39 (0x27) controls the lower 7 bits. The value of a 14-bit controller is determined by the interaction of the two halves. When the most significant 7 bits of a controller are set (using controller numbers 0 through 31), the lower 7 bits are automatically set to 0. The corresponding controller number for the lower 7 bits may then be used to further modulate the controller value. It is possible that the underlying synthesizer does not support a specific controller message. In order to verify that a call to controlChange was successful, use getController.
trans-unit.target: 控制器64至95（0x40-0x5F）允许7位精度。7位控制器的 value 完全由该值设置论据。另一组控制器通过使用两个控制器编号来提供14位精度，一个控制器编号用于最高有效7位，而另一组控制器用于最低有效7位。控制器编号0到31（0x00-0x1F）控制14位控制器的最高7位。控制器编号32到63（0x20-0x3F）控制这些控制器的最低7位。例如，控制器编号7（0x07）控制通道音量控制器的高7位，而控制器编号39（0x27）控制低7位。 14位控制器的值由两个部分的相互作用确定。设置控制器的最高7位（使用控制器编号0到31）时，低7位将自动设置为0。然后可以使用低7位的相应控制器编号来进一步调制控制器值。底层合成器可能不支持特定的控制器消息。为了验证呼叫 controlChange 成功，请使用 getController 。

trans-unit.source: Controls a module layer. The static methods defined by ModuleLayer to create module layers return a Controller that can be used to control modules in the layer.
trans-unit.target: 控制模块层。由 ModuleLayer 定义的用于创建模块层的静态方法返回一个 Controller ，该Controller可用于控制该层中的模块。

trans-unit.source: Controls how the presentation of messages occur for the message receiver
trans-unit.target: 控制消息接收者的消息显示方式。

trans-unit.source: Controls that provide a choice between only two settings can often be implemented instead as a BooleanControl, and controls that provide a set of values along some quantifiable dimension might be implemented instead as a FloatControl with a coarse resolution. However, a key feature of EnumControl is that the returned values are arbitrary objects, rather than numerical or boolean values. This means that each returned object can provide further information. As an example, the settings of a REVERB control are instances of ReverbType that can be queried for the parameter values used for each setting.
trans-unit.target: 在两个设置之间提供选择的控件通常可以实现为 BooleanControl ，而在某个可量化维度上提供一组值的控件可以实现为具有 FloatControl 分辨率的FloatControl。但是， EnumControl 的一个关键功能是返回的值是任意对象，而不是数字或布尔值。这意味着每个返回的对象都可以提供更多信息。例如， REVERB 控件的设置是 ReverbType 的实例，可以查询用于每个设置的参数值。

trans-unit.source: Controls that provide a choice between only two settings can often be implemented instead as a BooleanControl, and controls that provide a set of values along some quantifiable dimension might be implemented instead as a FloatControl with a coarse resolution. However, a key feature of EnumControl is that the returned values are arbitrary objects, rather than numerical or boolean values. This means that each returned object can provide further information. As an example, the settings of a REVERB control are instances of ReverbType that can be queried for the parameter values used for each setting.
trans-unit.target: 在两个设置之间进行选择的控件通常可以实现为 BooleanControl ，而在某个可量化维度上提供一组值的控件可以实现为具有 FloatControl 分辨率的FloatControl。但是， EnumControl 的一个关键功能是返回的值是任意对象，而不是数字或布尔值。这意味着每个返回的对象都可以提供更多信息。例如， REVERB 控件的设置是 ReverbType 的实例，可以查询用于每个设置的参数值。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether accepted server-mode SSLSockets will be initially configured to
trans-unit.target: 控制是否将 accept 服务器模式 SSLSockets 初始配置为

trans-unit.source: Controls whether accepted connections are in the (default) SSL server mode, or the SSL client mode.
trans-unit.target: 控制接受的连接是在(默认的)SSL服务器模式,还是SSL客户端模式。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether namespace declaration attributes are placed into the NSDECL namespace by processName().
trans-unit.target: 控制是否通过 processName() 将名称空间声明属性放置到 NSDECL 名称空间中。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether namespace declaration attributes are placed into the NSDECL namespace by processName(). This may only be changed before any contexts have been pushed.
trans-unit.target: 控制是否通过 processName() 将名称空间声明属性放置到 NSDECL 名称空间中。只能在推送任何上下文之前更改此设置。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether new SSL sessions may be established by the sockets which are created from this server socket.
trans-unit.target: 控制是否可以通过从该服务器套接字创建的套接字建立新的SSL会话。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether new SSL sessions may be established by this engine.
trans-unit.target: 控制该引擎是否可以建立新的SSL会话。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether new SSL sessions may be established by this engine. If session creations are not allowed, and there are no existing sessions to resume, there will be no successful handshaking.
trans-unit.target: 控制本引擎是否可以建立新的SSL会话。如果不允许建立会话,并且没有现有的会话要恢复,则不会成功握手。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether new SSL sessions may be established by this socket.
trans-unit.target: 控制该套接字是否可以建立新的SSL会话。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether new SSL sessions may be established by this socket. If session creations are not allowed, and there are no existing sessions to resume, there will be no successful handshaking.
trans-unit.target: 控制该套接字是否可以建立新的SSL会话。如果不允许建立会话,也没有现有的会话要恢复,则不会成功握手。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether or not the event is sent back down to the peer once the source has processed it - false means it's sent to the peer; true means it's not.
trans-unit.target: 控制源处理事件后,是否将其发回给对等体--false表示发回给对等体;true表示不发。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether or not the event is sent back down to the peer once the source has processed it - false means it's sent to the peer; true means it's not. Semantic events always have a 'true' value since they were generated by the peer in response to a low-level event.
trans-unit.target: 控制该事件在源处理后是否被下发回对等体--false表示被下发到对等体;true表示没有。语义事件总是有一个 "true "值,因为它们是由对等体响应低级事件而产生的。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the layout of Containers is validated dynamically during resizing, or statically, after resizing is complete.
trans-unit.target: 控制容器的布局是在调整大小时动态验证,还是在调整大小完成后静态验证。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the layout of Containers is validated dynamically during resizing, or statically, after resizing is complete. Use isDynamicLayoutActive() to detect if this feature enabled in this program and is supported by this operating system and/or window manager. Note that this feature is supported not on all platforms, and conversely, that this feature cannot be turned off on some platforms. On these platforms where dynamic layout during resizing is not supported (or is always supported), setting this property has no effect. Note that this feature can be set or unset as a property of the operating system or window manager on some platforms. On such platforms, the dynamic resize property must be set at the operating system or window manager level before this method can take effect. This method does not change support or settings of the underlying operating system or window manager. The OS/WM support can be queried using getDesktopProperty("awt.dynamicLayoutSupported") method.
trans-unit.target: 控制在调整大小时是动态验证容器的布局，还是在调整大小后静态验证容器的布局。使用 isDynamicLayoutActive() 检测此程序中是否启用了此功能，并且此操作系统和/或窗口管理器是否支持该功能。请注意，并非在所有平台上都支持此功能，相反，在某些平台上无法关闭此功能。在不支持（或始终支持）调整大小期间动态布局的这些平台上，设置此属性无效。请注意，在某些平台上，可以将此功能设置为或取消设置为操作系统或窗口管理器的属性。在此类平台上，必须在操作系统或窗口管理器级别设置动态调整大小属性，此方法才能生效。此方法不会更改基础操作系统或窗口管理器的支持或设置。可以使用getDesktopProperty（“ awt.dynamicLayoutSupported”）方法查询OS / WM支持。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the parser is reporting all validity errors; if true, all external entities will be read.
trans-unit.target: 控制解析器是否报告所有有效性错误;如果为真,将读取所有外部实体。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the parser reports Unicode normalization errors as described in section 2.13 and Appendix B of the XML 1.1 Recommendation. If true, Unicode normalization errors are reported using the ErrorHandler.error() callback. Such errors are not fatal in themselves (though, obviously, other Unicode-related encoding errors may be).
trans-unit.target: 控制解析器是否按照 XML 1.1 建议书第 2.13 节和附录 B 所述报告 Unicode 归一化错误。如果为真,则会使用 ErrorHandler.error()回调报告 Unicode 归一化错误。这种错误本身并不是致命的(不过,很明显,其他与Unicode相关的编码错误可能是致命的)。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether, when the namespace-prefixes feature is set, the parser treats namespace declaration attributes as being in the http://www.w3.org/2000/xmlns/ namespace. By default, SAX2 conforms to the original "Namespaces in XML" Recommendation, which explicitly states that such attributes are not in any namespace. Setting this optional flag to "true" makes the SAX2 events conform to a later backwards-incompatible revision of that recommendation, placing those attributes in a namespace.
trans-unit.target: 控制在设置了命名空间前缀功能时，解析器是否将命名空间声明属性视为位于http://www.w3.org/2000/xmlns/命名空间中。默认情况下，SAX2符合原始的“ XML中的命名空间”建议书，该建议书明确指出此类属性不在任何命名空间中。将此可选标志设置为“ true”可使SAX2事件符合该建议的以后向后不兼容的修订，从而将这些属性放在命名空间中。

trans-unit.source: Controls which particular protocols are enabled for use by accepted connections.
trans-unit.target: 控制接受的连接可以使用哪些特定的协议。

trans-unit.source: Convenience class for reading character files. The constructors of this class assume that the default character encoding and the default byte-buffer size are appropriate. To specify these values yourself, construct an InputStreamReader on a FileInputStream.

trans-unit.target: 用于编写字符文件的方便类。该类的构造函数假定默认的字符编码和默认的字节缓冲区大小是可以接受的。要自己指定这些值,请在FileOutputStream上构造一个OutputStreamWriter。

trans-unit.source: Convenience method for installing a property with the specified name and value on a component if that property has not already been set by the developer.
trans-unit.target: 方便的方法,用于在组件上安装具有指定名称和值的属性,如果该属性还没有被开发者设置。

trans-unit.source: Convenience method for installing a property with the specified name and value on a component if that property has not already been set by the developer. This method is intended to be used by ui delegate instances that need to specify a default value for a property of primitive type (boolean, int, ..), but do not wish to override a value set by the client. Since primitive property values cannot be wrapped with the UIResource marker, this method uses private state to determine whether the property has been set by the client.
trans-unit.target: 如果开发人员尚未设置具有指定名称和值的属性的便捷方法，该属性将在组件上安装。ui委托实例需要使用此方法，这些实例需要为原始类型的属性（布尔值，整数，..）指定默认值，但不希望覆盖客户端设置的值。由于原始属性值不能使用 UIResource 标记包装，因此此方法使用私有状态来确定客户端是否已设置属性。

trans-unit.source: Convenience method for searching above comp in the component hierarchy and returns the first object of name it finds.

trans-unit.source: Convenience method for searching above comp in the component hierarchy and returns the first object of class c it finds.

trans-unit.source: Convenience method that invokes one of undo or redo. If any edits have been undone (the index of the next edit is less than the length of the edits list) this invokes redo, otherwise it invokes undo.

trans-unit.source: Convenience method that returns estimateSize() if this Spliterator is SIZED, else -1.

trans-unit.target: 返回 getUndoPresentationName 或 getRedoPresentationName 的便捷方法。如果下一个编辑的索引等于编辑列表的大小，则返回 getUndoPresentationName ，否则返回 getRedoPresentationName 。

trans-unit.source: Convenience method that returns the first JLayeredPane which contains the specified component.

trans-unit.source: Convenience method that returns the first JLayeredPane which contains the specified component. Note that all JFrames have a JLayeredPane at their root, so any component in a JFrame will have a JLayeredPane parent.
trans-unit.target: 返回包含指定组件的第一个JLayeredPane的方便方法。请注意,所有JFrames的根部都有一个JLayeredPane,所以JFrame中的任何组件都有一个JLayeredPane父节点。

trans-unit.source: Convenience method that returns true if aComponent will be completely painted during the next paintDirtyRegions().

trans-unit.source: Convenience method that returns true if aComponent will be completely painted during the next paintDirtyRegions(). If computing dirty regions is expensive for your component, use this method and avoid computing dirty region if it return true.
trans-unit.target: 如果aComponent将在下一个paintDirtyRegions（）中完全绘制，则返回true的便捷方法。如果计算脏区对于您的组件来说很昂贵，请使用此方法，并避免在返回true时计算脏区。

trans-unit.source: Conversions are allowed between absolute values (from millimeters to centimeters, from degrees to radians, and so on) but not between relative values. (For example, a pixel value cannot be converted to a centimeter value.) Percentage values can't be converted since they are relative to the parent value (or another property value). There is one exception for color percentage values: since a color percentage value is relative to the range 0-255, a color percentage value can be converted to a number; (see also the RGBColor interface).
trans-unit.target: 允许在绝对值（从毫米到厘米，从度到弧度，等等）之间进行转换，但不允许在相对值之间进行转换。（例如，像素值不能转换为厘米值。）百分比值不能转换，因为它们是相对于父值（或另一个属性值）的。颜色百分比值有一个例外：由于颜色百分比值是相对于0-255的范围，因此可以将颜色百分比值转换为数字。（另请参见 RGBColor 接口）。

trans-unit.source: Conversions are divided into the following categories:

trans-unit.source: Conversions denoted by an upper-case character (i.e. 'B', 'H', 'S', 'C', 'X', 'E', 'G', 'A', and 'T') are the same as those for the corresponding lower-case conversion characters except that the result is converted to upper case according to the rules of the prevailing Locale. If there is no explicit locale specified, either at the construction of the instance or as a parameter to its method invocation, then the default locale is used.
trans-unit.target: 以大写字母表示的转换（即 'B' ， 'H' ， 'S' ， 'C' ， 'X' ， 'E' ， 'G' ， 'A' 和 'T' ）是相同的与相应的小写转换字符的字符相同，只是根据现行 Locale 的规则将结果转换为大写字母。如果在实例构造时或作为其方法调用的参数都未指定显式语言环境，则使用 default locale 。

trans-unit.source: Convert a aPoint in source coordinate system to destination coordinate system.

trans-unit.source: Convert a aPoint in source coordinate system to destination coordinate system. If source is null, aPoint is assumed to be in destination's root component coordinate system. If destination is null, aPoint will be converted to source's root component coordinate system. If both source and destination are null, return aPoint without any conversion.
trans-unit.target: 转换 aPoint 在 source 坐标系 destination 坐标系。如果 source 为 null ，则假定 aPoint 在 destination 的根组件坐标系中。如果 destination 为 null ，则 aPoint 将转换为 source 的根组件坐标系。如果 source 和 destination 均为 null ，则返回 aPoint 而不进行任何转换。

trans-unit.source: Convert a hit to a point in standard coordinates. The point is on the baseline of the character at the leading or trailing edge of the character, as appropriate. If the path is broken at the side of the character represented by the hit, the point will be adjacent to the character.
trans-unit.target: 在标准坐标中,将一个命中转换为一个点。该点在字符的基线上,在字符的前缘或后缘,视情况而定。如果路径在字符的一侧被打断,该点将与字符相邻。

trans-unit.source: Convert a location relative to the path to a point in user coordinates. The path might bend abruptly or be disjoint at the location's advance. If this is the case, the value of 'preceding' is used to disambiguate the portion of the path whose location and slope is to be used to interpret the offset.
trans-unit.target: 将一个相对于路径的位置转换为用户坐标中的一个点。路径可能会突然弯曲或在位置的前方不相交。在这种情况下,"preceding "的值用来区分路径的位置和斜率,用来解释偏移量。

trans-unit.source: Convert a point from a component's coordinate system to screen coordinates.

trans-unit.source: Convert a point from a screen coordinates to a component's coordinate system
trans-unit.target: 将一个点从屏幕坐标转换为一个组件的坐标系。

trans-unit.source: Convert a point in user space to a location relative to the path.
trans-unit.target: 将用户空间中的一个点转换为相对于路径的位置。

trans-unit.source: Convert a point in user space to a location relative to the path. The location is chosen so as to minimize the distance from the point to the path (e.g., the magnitude of the offset will be smallest). If there is more than one such location, the location with the smallest advance is chosen.
trans-unit.target: 将用户空间中的一个点转换为相对于路径的位置。这个位置的选择是为了最小化从点到路径的距离(例如,偏移量将是最小的)。如果有多个这样的位置,则选择提前量最小的位置。

trans-unit.source: Converting an instant to a zoned date-time is simple as there is only one valid offset for each instant.

trans-unit.source: Converting an instant to a zoned date-time is simple as there is only one valid offset for each instant. If the valid offset is different to the offset specified, then the date-time and offset of the zoned date-time will differ from those specified.
trans-unit.target: 将一个瞬间转换为区划日期-时间很简单,因为每个瞬间只有一个有效的偏移量。如果有效的偏移量与指定的偏移量不同,那么被分区的日期时间和偏移量将与指定的偏移量不同。

trans-unit.source: Converting between device XYZ values and the PCS XYZ values returned by this method corresponds to converting between the device's color space, as represented by CIE colorimetric values, and the PCS. There are many factors involved in this process, some of which are quite subtle. The most important, however, is the adjustment made to account for differences between the device's white point and the white point of the PCS. There are many techniques for doing this and it is the subject of much current research and controversy. Some commonly used methods are XYZ scaling, the von Kries transform, and the Bradford transform. The proper method to use depends upon each particular application.
trans-unit.target: 设备XYZ值和PCS之间的转换 此方法返回的XYZ值相当于设备的色彩空间(由CIE色度值代表)和PCS之间的转换。在这个过程中涉及许多因素,其中一些因素非常微妙。然而,最重要的是对设备的白点和 PCS 的白点之间的差异进行调整。有许多技术可以做到这一点,这也是当前许多研究和争议的主题。一些常用的方法是XYZ缩放、von Kries变换和Bradford变换。正确的使用方法取决于每个特定的应用。

trans-unit.source: Converting between device XYZ values and the PCS XYZ values taken as arguments by this method corresponds to converting between the device's color space, as represented by CIE colorimetric values, and the PCS. There are many factors involved in this process, some of which are quite subtle. The most important, however, is the adjustment made to account for differences between the device's white point and the white point of the PCS. There are many techniques for doing this and it is the subject of much current research and controversy. Some commonly used methods are XYZ scaling, the von Kries transform, and the Bradford transform. The proper method to use depends upon each particular application.
trans-unit.target: 器件XYZ值和PCS XYZ值之间的转换 此方法所采用的参数相当于在CIE色度值所代表的器件色彩空间和PCS之间进行转换。在这个过程中涉及到许多因素,其中一些因素非常微妙。然而,最重要的是对设备的白点和 PCS 的白点之间的差异进行调整。有许多技术可以做到这一点,这也是当前许多研究和争议的主题。一些常用的方法是XYZ缩放、von Kries变换和Bradford变换。正确的使用方法取决于每个特定的应用。

trans-unit.source: Converting between the two time-lines involves calculating the offset using the rules accessed from the ZoneId. Obtaining the offset for an instant is simple, as there is exactly one valid offset for each instant. By contrast, obtaining the offset for a local date-time is not straightforward. There are three cases:

trans-unit.source: Converts a given path string to a Path and resolves it against this Path in exactly the manner specified by the resolve method. For example, suppose that the name separator is "/" and a path represents "foo/bar", then invoking this method with the path string "gus" will result in the Path "foo/bar/gus".

trans-unit.source: Converts a given path string to a Path and resolves it against this Path in exactly the manner specified by the resolve method. trans-unit.source: Converts a method handle to a new type.

trans-unit.source: Converts a path string, or a sequence of strings that when joined form a path string, to a Path.
trans-unit.target: 将路径字符串或一系列字符串（在连接时形成路径字符串）转换为 Path 。

trans-unit.source: Converts a path string, or a sequence of strings that when joined form a path string, to a Path. If more does not specify any elements then the value of the first parameter is the path string to convert. If more specifies one or more elements then each non-empty string, including first, is considered to be a sequence of name elements (see Path) and is joined to form a path string. The details as to how the Strings are joined is provider specific but typically they will be joined using the name-separator as the separator. For example, if the name separator is "/" and getPath("/foo","bar","gus") is invoked, then the path string "/foo/bar/gus" is converted to a Path. A Path representing an empty path is returned if first is the empty string and more does not contain any non-empty strings.
trans-unit.target: 将路径字符串或一系列字符串（在连接时形成路径字符串）转换为 Path 。如果 more 不指定任何元素，则 first 参数的值是要转换的路径字符串。如果 more 指定一个或多个元素，则将每个非空字符串（包括 first ）视为名称元素的序列（请参见 Path ），并将其连接起来以形成路径字符串。有关如何连接字符串的详细信息是特定于提供程序的，但是通常将使用 name-separator 作为分隔符将它们连接在一起。例如，如果名称分隔符为“ / ”且 getPath("/foo","bar","gus") 被调用，然后将路径字符串 "/foo/bar/gus" 转换为 Path 。一个 Path 如果返回代表空路径 first 是空字符串，并且 more 不包含任何非空字符串。

trans-unit.source: Converts a path string, or a sequence of strings that when joined form a path string, to a Path. If more does not specify any elements then the value of the first parameter is the path string to convert. If more specifies one or more elements then each non-empty string, including first, is considered to be a sequence of name elements (see Path) and is joined to form a path string. The details as to how the Strings are joined is provider specific but typically they will be joined using the name-separator as the separator. For example, if the name separator is "/" and getPath("/foo","bar","gus") is invoked, then the path string "/foo/bar/gus" is converted to a Path. A Path representing an empty path is returned if first is the empty string and more does not contain any non-empty strings.
trans-unit.target: 将路径字符串或一系列字符串（在连接时形成路径字符串）转换为 Path 。如果 more 不指定任何元素，则 first 参数的值是要转换的路径字符串。如果 more 指定一个或多个元素，则将每个非空字符串（包括 first ）视为名称元素的序列（请参见 Path ），并将其连接起来以形成路径字符串。有关如何将字符串联接的详细信息是提供程序特定的，但通常将使用 name-separator 作为分隔符来联接它们。例如，如果名称分隔符为“ / ”且 getPath("/foo","bar","gus") 被调用，然后将路径字符串 "/foo/bar/gus" 转换为 Path 。一个 Path 如果返回代表空路径 first 是空字符串，并且 more 不包含任何非空字符串。

trans-unit.source: Converts the CollationKey to a sequence of bits. If two CollationKeys could be legitimately compared, then one could compare the byte arrays for each of those keys to obtain the same result. Byte arrays are organized most significant byte first.
trans-unit.target: 将CollationKey转换为一个比特序列。如果两个CollationKey可以合法地进行比较,那么我们可以比较每个键的字节数组来获得相同的结果。字节数组的组织方式是最重要的字节优先。

trans-unit.source: Converts the argument to a long by an unsigned conversion.
trans-unit.target: 通过无符号转换将参数转换为 long 。

trans-unit.source: Converts the argument to a long by an unsigned conversion. In an unsigned conversion to a long, the high-order 32 bits of the long are zero and the low-order 32 bits are equal to the bits of the integer argument. Consequently, zero and positive int values are mapped to a numerically equal long value and negative int values are mapped to a long value equal to the input plus 232.
trans-unit.target: 通过无符号转换将参数转换为 long 。在一个无符号转换为 long ，的高阶32位 long 是零和低32位等于整数参数的比特。因此，零和正 int 值映射为数值上相等的 long 值，而负 int 值映射为等于输入加2 32的 long 值。

trans-unit.source: Converts the argument to a long by an unsigned conversion. In an unsigned conversion to a long, the high-order 32 bits of the long are zero and the low-order 32 bits are equal to the bits of the integer argument. Consequently, zero and positive int values are mapped to a numerically equal long value and negative int values are mapped to a long value equal to the input plus 232.
trans-unit.target: 通过无符号转换将参数转换为 long 。在一个无符号转换为 long ，的高阶32位 long 是零和低32位等于整数参数的比特。因此，零和正 int 值被映射到一个数值上等于 long 值和阴性 int 值被映射到一个 long 值等于输入加2 32。

trans-unit.source: Converts the argument to a long by an unsigned conversion. In an unsigned conversion to a long, the high-order 48 bits of the long are zero and the low-order 16 bits are equal to the bits of the short argument. Consequently, zero and positive short values are mapped to a numerically equal long value and negative short values are mapped to a long value equal to the input plus 216.
trans-unit.target: 通过无符号转换将参数转换为 long 。在一个无符号转换为 long ，的高阶48位 long 是零和低阶16个比特都等于的比特 short 参数。因此，零和正的 short 值被映射为数值相等的 long 值，负的 short 值被映射为等于输入加2 16的 long 值。

trans-unit.source: Converts the argument to a long by an unsigned conversion. In an unsigned conversion to a long, the high-order 48 bits of the long are zero and the low-order 16 bits are equal to the bits of the short argument. Consequently, zero and positive short values are mapped to a numerically equal long value and negative short values are mapped to a long value equal to the input plus 216.

trans-unit.source: Converts the argument to a long by an unsigned conversion. In an unsigned conversion to a long, the high-order 56 bits of the long are zero and the low-order 8 bits are equal to the bits of the byte argument. Consequently, zero and positive byte values are mapped to a numerically equal long value and negative byte values are mapped to a long value equal to the input plus 28.

trans-unit.source: Converts the argument to a long by an unsigned conversion. Consequently, zero and positive byte values are mapped to a numerically equal long value and negative byte values are mapped to a long value equal to the input plus 28.

trans-unit.source: Converts the argument to an int by an unsigned conversion. In an unsigned conversion to an int, the high-order 16 bits of the int are zero and the low-order 16 bits are equal to the bits of the short argument. Consequently, zero and positive short values are mapped to a numerically equal int value and negative short values are mapped to an int value equal to the input plus 216.
trans-unit.target: 通过无符号转换将参数转换为 int 。在无符号转换为一个 int ，所述的高阶16位 int 是零和低阶16个比特都等于的比特 short 参数。因此，零个和正的 short 值被映射为一个数值相等的 int 值，负的一个 short 值被映射为一个等于输入值加上2 16的 int 值。

trans-unit.source: Converts the argument to an int by an unsigned conversion. In an unsigned conversion to an int, the high-order 16 bits of the int are zero and the low-order 16 bits are equal to the bits of the short argument. Consequently, zero and positive short values are mapped to a numerically equal int value and negative short values are mapped to an int value equal to the input plus 216.
trans-unit.target: 通过无符号转换将参数转换为 int 。在无符号转换为一个 int ，所述的高阶16位 int 是零和低阶16个比特都等于的比特 short 参数。因此，零个和正的 short 值被映射为一个数值相等的 int 值，负的一个 short 值被映射为一个等于输入加2 16的 int 值。

trans-unit.source: Converts the argument to an int by an unsigned conversion. In an unsigned conversion to an int, the high-order 24 bits of the int are zero and the low-order 8 bits are equal to the bits of the byte argument. Consequently, zero and positive byte values are mapped to a numerically equal int value and negative byte values are mapped to an int value equal to the input plus 28.
trans-unit.target: 通过无符号转换将参数转换为 int 。在无符号转换为一个 int ，所述的高阶24位 int 是零和低位8位都等于的比特 byte 的参数。因此，零 byte 和正字节值映射到数值上相等的 int 值，负 byte 值映射到等于输入加2 8的 int 值。

trans-unit.source: Converts the argument to an int by an unsigned conversion. In an unsigned conversion to an int, the high-order 24 bits of the int are zero and the low-order 8 bits are equal to the bits of the byte argument. Consequently, zero and positive byte values are mapped to a numerically equal int value and negative byte values are mapped to an int value equal to the input plus 28.
trans-unit.target: 通过无符号转换将参数转换为 int 。在无符号转换为一个 int ，所述的高阶24位 int 是零和低位8位都等于的比特 byte 的参数。因此，零 byte 和正字节值映射到一个数值相等的 int 值，负 byte 值映射到一个等于输入加2 8的 int 值。

trans-unit.source: Converts the attribute set to a String.
trans-unit.target: 将属性集转换为一个字符串。

trans-unit.source: Converts the buffer's contents into a string by decoding the bytes using the named charset.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用命名的 charset 解码字节，将缓冲区的内容转换为字符串。

trans-unit.source: Converts the buffer's contents into a string by decoding the bytes using the named charset. The length of the new String is a function of the charset, and hence may not be equal to the length of the byte array.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用命名的 charset 解码字节，将缓冲区的内容转换为字符串。新 String 的长度是字符集的函数，因此可能不等于字节数组的长度。

trans-unit.source: Converts the buffer's contents into a string by decoding the bytes using the specified charset.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用指定的 charset 解码字节，将缓冲区的内容转换为字符串。

trans-unit.source: Converts the buffer's contents into a string by decoding the bytes using the specified charset. The length of the new String is a function of the charset, and hence may not be equal to the length of the byte array.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用指定的 charset 解码字节，将缓冲区的内容转换为字符串。新 String 的长度是字符集的函数，因此可能不等于字节数组的长度。

trans-unit.source: Converts the buffer's contents into a string decoding bytes using the platform's default character set.
trans-unit.target: 使用平台的默认字符集将缓冲区的内容转换为字符串解码字节。

trans-unit.source: Converts the buffer's contents into a string decoding bytes using the platform's default character set. The length of the new String is a function of the character set, and hence may not be equal to the size of the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 使用平台的默认字符集将缓冲区的内容转换为解码字节的字符串。新 String 的长度是字符集的函数，因此可能不等于缓冲区的大小。

trans-unit.source: Converts the character (Unicode code point) argument to lowercase using case mapping information from the UnicodeData file.
trans-unit.target: 使用UnicodeData文件中的大小写映射信息,将字符(Unicode码点)参数转换为小写。

trans-unit.source: Converts the character (Unicode code point) argument to titlecase using case mapping information from the UnicodeData file.
trans-unit.target: 利用UnicodeData文件中的大小写映射信息,将字符(Unicode码点)参数转换为大小写。

trans-unit.source: Converts the character (Unicode code point) argument to titlecase using case mapping information from the UnicodeData file. If a character has no explicit titlecase mapping and is not itself a titlecase char according to UnicodeData, then the uppercase mapping is returned as an equivalent titlecase mapping. If the character argument is already a titlecase character, the same character value will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 使用UnicodeData文件中的大小写映射信息将字符(Unicode码点)参数转换为大小写。如果一个字符没有明确的大小写映射,而且根据UnicodeData,它本身不是一个大小写字符,那么大写映射将作为一个等价的大小写映射返回。如果字符参数已经是一个大小写字符,那么将返回相同的字符值。

trans-unit.source: Converts the character (Unicode code point) argument to uppercase using case mapping information from the UnicodeData file.
trans-unit.target: 利用UnicodeData文件中的大小写映射信息,将字符(Unicode码点)参数转换为大写。

trans-unit.source: Converts the character argument to lowercase using case mapping information from the UnicodeData file.
trans-unit.target: 使用UnicodeData文件中的大小写映射信息将字符参数转换为小写。

trans-unit.source: Converts the character argument to titlecase using case mapping information from the UnicodeData file.
trans-unit.target: 使用UnicodeData文件中的大小写映射信息将字符参数转换为大小写。

trans-unit.source: Converts the character argument to titlecase using case mapping information from the UnicodeData file. If a character has no explicit titlecase mapping and is not itself a titlecase char according to UnicodeData, then the uppercase mapping is returned as an equivalent titlecase mapping. If the char argument is already a titlecase char, the same char value will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 使用UnicodeData文件中的大小写映射信息将字符参数转换为标题大写。如果字符没有显式的标题大小写映射，并且根据UnicodeData本身不是标题大小写字符，则将大写映射作为等效的标题大小写映射返回。如果 char 参数已经是一个标题用例 char ，则将返回相同的 char 值。

trans-unit.source: Converts the character argument to uppercase using case mapping information from the UnicodeData file.
trans-unit.target: 使用UnicodeData文件中的大小写映射信息将字符参数转换为大写。

trans-unit.source: Converts the components of a color, as specified by the HSB model, to an equivalent set of values for the default RGB model.
trans-unit.target: 将HSB模型指定的颜色组件转换为默认RGB模型的等价值。

trans-unit.source: Converts the components of a color, as specified by the default RGB model, to an equivalent set of values for hue, saturation, and brightness that are the three components of the HSB model.
trans-unit.target: 将默认RGB模型指定的颜色成分转换为等价的色相、饱和度和亮度的一组值,即HSB模型的三个成分。

trans-unit.source: Converts the current calendar field values in fields[] to the millisecond time value time.
trans-unit.target: 将 fields[] 的当前日历字段值转换为毫秒时间值 time 。

trans-unit.source: Converts the current calendar field values in fields[] to the millisecond time value time.
trans-unit.target: 将 fields[] 的当前日历字段值转换为毫秒时间值 time 。

trans-unit.source: Converts the current millisecond time value time to calendar field values in fields[].
trans-unit.target: 将当前毫秒时间值 time 转换为 fields[] 日历字段值。

trans-unit.source: Converts the current millisecond time value time to calendar field values in fields[]. This allows you to sync up the calendar field values with a new time that is set for the calendar. The time is not recomputed first; to recompute the time, then the fields, call the complete() method.
trans-unit.target: 将当前毫秒时间值 time 转换为 fields[] 日历字段值。这使您可以将日历字段值与为日历设置的新时间同步。不首先重新计算时间。要重新计算时间，然后重新计算字段，请调用 complete() 方法。

trans-unit.source: Converts the current millisecond time value time to calendar field values in fields[]. This allows you to sync up the calendar field values with a new time that is set for the calendar. The time is not recomputed first; to recompute the time, then the fields, call the complete() method.
trans-unit.target: 将当前毫秒时间值 time 转换为 fields[] 日历字段值。这使您可以将日历字段值与为日历设置的新时间同步。不首先重新计算时间；要重新计算时间，然后重新计算字段，请调用 complete() 方法。

trans-unit.source: Converts the designated column in this CachedRowSet object to a Collection object.
trans-unit.target: 将此 CachedRowSet 对象中的指定列转换为 Collection 对象。

trans-unit.source: Converts the designated column in this CachedRowSet object to a Collection object. Implementations have some latitude in how they can represent this Collection object because of the abstract nature of the Collection framework. Each column value should be fully represented in either a general purpose Collection implementation or a specialized Collection implementation, such as a Vector object. An SQL NULL column value must be represented as a null in the Java programming language.
trans-unit.target: 将此 CachedRowSet 对象中的指定列转换为 Collection 对象。由于 Collection 框架的抽象性质，实现在如何表示此 Collection 对象方面有一定的自由度。每个列值都应在通用 Collection 实现或专用 Collection 实现（例如 Vector 对象）中完整表示。 SQL NULL 列值必须用Java编程语言表示为 null 。

trans-unit.source: Converts the digits in the text that occur between start and start + count, using the provided context.
trans-unit.target: 使用提供的 context 转换在 start 和 start + count 之间出现的文本中的数字。

trans-unit.source: Converts the digits in the text that occur between start and start + count, using the provided context. Context is ignored if the shaper is not a contextual shaper.
trans-unit.target: 使用提供的 context 转换在 start 和 start + count 之间出现的文本中的数字。 Context 如果成形器不是上下文成形器被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Converts the digits in the text that occur between start and start + count, using the provided context.
trans-unit.target: 使用提供的上下文转换文本中出现在开始和开始+计数之间的数字。

trans-unit.source: Converts the digits in the text that occur between start and start + count, using the provided context. Context is ignored if the shaper is not a contextual shaper.
trans-unit.target: 使用提供的上下文转换文本中出现在start和start+count之间的数字。如果shaper不是上下文shaper,则会忽略上下文。

trans-unit.source: Converts the digits in the text that occur between start and start + count.
trans-unit.target: 转换文本中出现在开始和开始+计数之间的数字。

trans-unit.source: Converts the directory to a metadata object.
trans-unit.target: 将目录转换为元数据对象。

trans-unit.source: Converts the double argument to a long using the doubleToLongBits method in class Double, and then writes that long value to the file as an eight-byte quantity, high byte first.
trans-unit.target: 使用类 Double 中的 doubleToLongBits 方法将double参数转换为 long ，然后将该 long 值作为八字节数量写入文件，高字节在前。

trans-unit.source: Converts the double argument to a long using the doubleToLongBits method in class Double, and then writes that long value to the file as an eight-byte quantity, high byte first. The write starts at the current position of the file pointer.
trans-unit.target: 使用类 Double 中的 doubleToLongBits 方法将double参数转换为 long ，然后将该 long 值作为八字节数量写入文件，高字节在前。写入从文件指针的当前位置开始。

trans-unit.source: Converts the double argument to a long using the doubleToLongBits method in class Double, and then writes that long value to the underlying output stream as an 8-byte quantity, high byte first.
trans-unit.target: 使用类 Double 中的 doubleToLongBits 方法将double参数转换为 long ，然后将该 long 值作为8字节的数量写入高位字节的基础输出流。

trans-unit.source: Converts the double argument to a long using the doubleToLongBits method in class Double, and then writes that long value to the underlying output stream as an 8-byte quantity, high byte first. If no exception is thrown, the counter written is incremented by 8.
trans-unit.target: 使用类 Double 中的 doubleToLongBits 方法将double参数转换为 long ，然后将该 long 值作为8字节的量写入高位字节的基础输出流。如果未引发异常，则 written 的计数器将增加 8 。

trans-unit.source: Converts the element to a string.
trans-unit.target: 将元素转换为字符串。

trans-unit.source: Converts the float argument to an int using the floatToIntBits method in class Float, and then writes that int value to the file as a four-byte quantity, high byte first.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Float 类中的 floatToIntBits 方法将float参数转换为 int ，然后将该 int 值以四字节的数量写入文件，高字节在前。

trans-unit.source: Converts the float argument to an int using the floatToIntBits method in class Float, and then writes that int value to the file as a four-byte quantity, high byte first. The write starts at the current position of the file pointer.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Float 类中的 floatToIntBits 方法将float参数转换为 int ，然后将该 int 值以四字节的数量写入文件，高字节在前。写入从文件指针的当前位置开始。

trans-unit.source: Converts the float argument to an int using the floatToIntBits method in class Float, and then writes that int value to the underlying output stream as a 4-byte quantity, high byte first.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Float 类中的 floatToIntBits 方法将float参数转换为 int ，然后将该 int 值以4字节的数量写入高位字节的基础输出流。

trans-unit.source: Converts the float argument to an int using the floatToIntBits method in class Float, and then writes that int value to the underlying output stream as a 4-byte quantity, high byte first. If no exception is thrown, the counter written is incremented by 4.
trans-unit.target: 使用类 Float 中的 floatToIntBits 方法将float参数转换为 int ，然后将该 int 值作为4字节数量（高字节在前）写入基础输出流。如果未引发异常，则 written 的计数器将增加 4 。

trans-unit.source: Converts the given baseName and locale to the bundle name.
trans-unit.target: 将给定的 baseName 和 locale 转换为包名称。

trans-unit.source: Converts the given baseName and locale to the bundle name. This method is called from the default implementation of the newBundle and needsReload methods.
trans-unit.target: 将给定的 baseName 和 locale 转换为包名称。从 newBundle 和 needsReload 方法的默认实现中调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Converts the given baseName and locale to the bundle name. This method is called from the default implementation of the newBundle and needsReload methods.
trans-unit.target: 将给定的 baseName 和 locale 转换为包名称。从 newBundle 和 needsReload 方法的默认实现中调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Converts the given bundleName to the form required by the ClassLoader.getResource method by replacing all occurrences of '.' in bundleName with '/' and appending a '.' and the given file suffix.
trans-unit.target: 通过替换所有出现的 '.' ，将给定的 bundleName 转换为 ClassLoader.getResource 方法所需的形式。在 bundleName 中使用 '/' 并附加 '.' 和给定的文件 suffix 。

trans-unit.source: Converts the given bundleName to the form required by the ClassLoader.getResource method by replacing all occurrences of '.' in bundleName with '/' and appending a '.' and the given file suffix. For example, if bundleName is "foo.bar.MyResources_ja_JP" and suffix is "properties", then "foo/bar/MyResources_ja_JP.properties" is returned.
trans-unit.target: 通过替换所有出现的 '.' ，将给定的 bundleName 转换为 ClassLoader.getResource 方法所需的形式。在 bundleName 中使用 '/' 并附加 '.' 和给定的文件 suffix 。例如，如果 bundleName 为 "foo.bar.MyResources_ja_JP" ， suffix 为 "properties" ，则返回 "foo/bar/MyResources_ja_JP.properties" 。

trans-unit.source: Converts the given bundleName to the form required by the ClassLoader.getResource method by replacing all occurrences of '.' in bundleName with '/' and appending a '.' and the given file suffix. For example, if bundleName is "foo.bar.MyResources_ja_JP" and suffix is "properties", then "foo/bar/MyResources_ja_JP.properties" is returned.
trans-unit.target: 通过替换所有出现的 '.' ，将给定的 bundleName 转换为 ClassLoader.getResource 方法所需的形式。在 bundleName 中带有 '/' 并附加 '.' 和给定的文件 suffix 。例如，如果 bundleName 为 "foo.bar.MyResources_ja_JP" ， suffix 为 "properties" ，则返回 "foo/bar/MyResources_ja_JP.properties" 。

trans-unit.source: Converts the given SQL statement into the system's native SQL grammar.
trans-unit.target: 将给定的SQL语句转换为系统的本地SQL语法。

trans-unit.source: Converts the given SQL statement into the system's native SQL grammar. A driver may convert the JDBC SQL grammar into its system's native SQL grammar prior to sending it. This method returns the native form of the statement that the driver would have sent.
trans-unit.target: 将给定的SQL语句转换为系统的本地SQL语法。驱动程序可以在发送JDBC SQL语法之前将其转换为系统的本地SQL语法。此方法返回驱动程序本应发送的语句的本机形式。

trans-unit.source: Converts the given URI to a Path object.
trans-unit.target: 将给定的URI转换为 Path 对象。

trans-unit.source: Converts the given location in the model to a place in the view coordinate system.
trans-unit.target: 将模型中给定的位置转换为视图坐标系中的位置。

trans-unit.source: Converts the given location in the model to a place in the view coordinate system. The component must have a non-zero positive size for this translation to be computed.
trans-unit.target: 将模型中给定的位置转换为视图坐标系中的一个位置。分量必须有一个非零的正值才能计算转换。

trans-unit.source: Converts the given location in the model to a place in the view coordinate system. The component must have a positive size for this translation to be computed (i.e. layout cannot be computed until the component has been sized). The component does not have to be visible or painted.
trans-unit.target: 将模型中给定的位置转换为视图坐标系中的位置。要计算转换,组件必须有正的尺寸(即在组件尺寸确定之前不能计算布局)。组件不一定是可见的,也不一定是涂抹的。

trans-unit.source: Converts the given place in the view coordinate system to the nearest representative location in the model.
trans-unit.target: 将视图坐标系中给定的位置转换为模型中最近的代表位置。

trans-unit.source: Converts the given place in the view coordinate system to the nearest representative location in the model. The component must have a non-zero positive size for this translation to be computed.
trans-unit.target: 将视图坐标系中给定的位置转换为模型中最近的代表位置。分量必须有一个非零的正值才能计算转换。

trans-unit.source: Converts the given place in the view coordinate system to the nearest representative location in the model. The component must have a positive size for this translation to be computed (i.e. layout cannot be computed until the component has been sized). The component does not have to be visible or painted.
trans-unit.target: 将视图坐标系中给定的位置转换为模型中最近的代表位置。要计算转换,组件必须有正的尺寸(即在组件尺寸确定之前不能计算布局)。组件不一定是可见的,也不一定要画出来。

trans-unit.source: Converts the given time duration in the given unit to this unit.
trans-unit.target: 将给定单位的时间长度转换为这个单位。

trans-unit.source: Converts the given time duration in the given unit to this unit. Conversions from finer to coarser granularities truncate, so lose precision. For example, converting 999 milliseconds to seconds results in 0. Conversions from coarser to finer granularities with arguments that would numerically overflow saturate to Long.MIN_VALUE if negative or Long.MAX_VALUE if positive.
trans-unit.target: 将以给定单位为单位的给定持续时间转换为此单位。从较细粒度到较粗粒度的转换会截断，因此会降低精度。例如，将 999 毫秒转换为秒将产生 0 。从较粗粒度到较细粒度的转换（带有数值溢出的参数，如果为负，则饱和为 Long.MIN_VALUE ,如果为正， Long.MAX_VALUE 。

trans-unit.source: Converts the given time duration to this unit.
trans-unit.target: 将给定的时间长度转换为该单位。

trans-unit.source: Converts the object to a string.
trans-unit.target: 将对象转换为字符串。

trans-unit.source: Converts the object to a string. The string representation is the string "class" or "interface", followed by a space, and then by the fully qualified name of the class in the format returned by getName. If this Class object represents a primitive type, this method returns the name of the primitive type. If this Class object represents void this method returns "void".
trans-unit.target: 将对象转换为字符串。字符串表示形式是字符串“ class”或“ interface”，后跟一个空格，然后是该类的完全限定名称，其格式为 getName 返回。如果此 Class 对象表示原始类型，则此方法返回原始类型的名称。如果此 Class 对象表示void，则此方法返回“ void”。

trans-unit.source: Converts the object to a string. The string representation is the string "class" or "interface", followed by a space, and then by the fully qualified name of the class in the format returned by getName. If this Class object represents a primitive type, this method returns the name of the primitive type. If this Class object represents void this method returns "void". If this Class object represents an array type, this method returns "class " followed by getName.
trans-unit.target: 将对象转换为字符串。字符串表示形式是字符串“ class”或“ interface”，后跟空格，然后是 getName 返回的格式的类的完全限定名称。如果此 Class 对象表示原始类型，则此方法返回原始类型的名称。如果此 Class 对象表示void，则此方法返回“ void”。如果此 Class 对象表示数组类型，则此方法返回“ class”，后跟 getName 。

trans-unit.source: Converts the object to a string. The string representation is the string "class" or "interface", followed by a space, and then by the name of the class in the format returned by getName. If this Class object represents a primitive type, this method returns the name of the primitive type. If this Class object represents void this method returns "void". If this Class object represents an array type, this method returns "class " followed by getName.
trans-unit.target: 将对象转换为字符串。字符串表示形式是字符串“ class”或“ interface”，后跟一个空格，然后是 getName 返回的格式的类名称。如果此 Class 对象表示原始类型，则此方法返回原始类型的名称。如果此 Class 对象表示void，则此方法返回“ void”。如果此 Class 对象表示数组类型，则此方法返回“ class”，后跟 getName 。

trans-unit.source: Converts the output to upper case according to the rules of the locale given during creation of the formatter argument of the formatTo() method.
trans-unit.target: 根据在 formatTo() 方法的 formatter 参数创建过程中给定的语言环境规则，将输出转换为大写。

trans-unit.source: Converts the output to upper case according to the rules of the locale given during creation of the formatter argument of the formatTo() method. The output should be equivalent the following invocation of String.toUpperCase(java.util.Locale)
trans-unit.target: 根据在 formatTo() 方法的 formatter 参数创建过程中给定的语言环境规则，将输出转换为大写。输出应等效于 String.toUpperCase(java.util.Locale) 的以下调用

trans-unit.source: Converts the output to upper case according to the rules of the locale given during creation of the formatter argument of the formatTo() method. The output should be equivalent the following invocation of String.toUpperCase(java.util.Locale)
trans-unit.target: 根据在 formatTo() 方法的 formatter 参数创建过程中给定的语言环境规则，将输出转换为大写。输出应等效于 String.toUpperCase(java.util.Locale) 的以下调用

trans-unit.source: Converts the passed in Object into a String by way of the toString method.
trans-unit.target: 通过 toString 方法将传入的Object转换为String 。

trans-unit.source: Converts the passed in String into an instance of getValueClass by way of the constructor that takes a String argument.
trans-unit.target: 通过采用String参数的构造函数，将传入的String转换为 getValueClass 的实例。

trans-unit.source: Converts the passed in String into an instance of getValueClass by way of the constructor that takes a String argument. If getValueClass returns null, the Class of the current value in the JFormattedTextField will be used. If this is null, a String will be returned. If the constructor throws an exception, a ParseException will be thrown. If there is no single argument String constructor, string will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 通过采用String参数的构造函数，将传入的String转换为 getValueClass 的实例。如果 getValueClass 返回null，则将使用 JFormattedTextField 中当前值的Class 。如果为null，则将返回一个String。如果构造函数引发异常，则将引发 ParseException 。如果没有单个参数String构造函数，则将返回 string 。

trans-unit.source: Converts the source code of a snippet into a Snippet object (or list of Snippet objects in the case of some var declarations, e.g.: int x, y, z;).
trans-unit.target: 一个片段的源代码转换成一个 Snippet 的对象（或列表 Snippet 中的一些变种声明，例如的情况下对象：整数X，Y，Z）。

trans-unit.source: Converts the source code of a snippet into a Snippet object (or list of Snippet objects in the case of some var declarations, e.g.: int x, y, z;). Does not install the snippets: declarations are not accessible by other snippets; imports are not added. Does not execute the snippets.
trans-unit.target: 一个片段的源代码转换成一个 Snippet 的对象（或列表 Snippet 中的一些变种声明，例如的情况下对象：整数X，Y，Z）。不安装代码段：其他代码段不能访问声明；导入未添加。不执行代码段。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified character (Unicode code point) to its UTF-16 representation stored in a char array.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的字符（Unicode代码点）转换为存储在 char 数组中的UTF-16表示形式。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified character (Unicode code point) to its UTF-16 representation stored in a char array. If the specified code point is a BMP (Basic Multilingual Plane or Plane 0) value, the resulting char array has the same value as codePoint. If the specified code point is a supplementary code point, the resulting char array has the corresponding surrogate pair.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的字符（Unicode代码点）转换为存储在 char 数组中的UTF-16表示形式。如果指定的代码点是BMP（基本多语言平面或平面0）值，则所得的 char 数组具有与 codePoint 相同的值。如果指定的代码点是辅助代码点，则所得的 char 数组具有相应的代理对。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified character (Unicode code point) to its UTF-16 representation.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的字符(Unicode码点)转换为UTF-16表示。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified character (Unicode code point) to its UTF-16 representation. If the specified code point is a BMP (Basic Multilingual Plane or Plane 0) value, the same value is stored in dst[dstIndex], and 1 is returned. If the specified code point is a supplementary character, its surrogate values are stored in dst[dstIndex] (high-surrogate) and dst[dstIndex+1] (low-surrogate), and 2 is returned.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的字符（Unicode代码点）转换为其UTF-16表示形式。如果指定的代码点是BMP（基本多语言平面或平面0）值，则相同的值存储在 dst[dstIndex] ，并返回1。如果指定的代码点是补充字符，则其替代值存储在 dst[dstIndex] （高替代）和 dst[dstIndex+1] （低替代）中，并返回2。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified local date-time to the local date-time actually seen on a wall clock.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的本地日期-时间转换为挂钟上实际看到的本地日期-时间。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified surrogate pair to its supplementary code point value.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的代用对转换为其补充码点值。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified surrogate pair to its supplementary code point value. This method does not validate the specified surrogate pair. The caller must validate it using isSurrogatePair if necessary.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的代理对转换为其补充代码点值。此方法不验证指定的代理对。如有必要，调用者必须使用 isSurrogatePair 对其进行验证。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified surrogate pair to its supplementary code point value. This method does not validate the specified surrogate pair. The caller must validate it using isSurrogatePair if necessary.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的代理对转换为其补充代码点值。此方法不验证指定的代理对。如有必要，调用者必须使用 isSurrogatePair 对其进行验证。

trans-unit.source: Converts this CachedRowSet object to a Collection object that contains all of this CachedRowSet object's data. Implementations have some latitude in how they can represent this Collection object because of the abstract nature of the Collection framework. Each row must be fully represented in either a general purpose Collection implementation or a specialized Collection implementation, such as a TreeMap object or a Vector object. An SQL NULL column value must be represented as a null in the Java programming language.
trans-unit.target: 将此 CachedRowSet 对象转换为包含所有 CachedRowSet 对象的数据的 Collection 对象。由于 Collection 框架的抽象性质，实现在如何表示此 Collection 对象方面有一定的自由度。每行都必须在通用 Collection 实现或专用 Collection 实现（例如 TreeMap 对象或 Vector 对象）中完全表示。 SQL NULL 列值必须用Java编程语言表示为 null 。

trans-unit.source: CookieManager
trans-unit.target: CookieManager

trans-unit.source: CookieManager provides a concrete implementation of CookieHandler, which separates the storage of cookies from the policy surrounding accepting and rejecting cookies.
trans-unit.target: CookieManager提供了 CookieHandler 的具体实现，该实现将cookie的存储与围绕接受和拒绝cookie的策略分开。

trans-unit.source: CookieManager provides a concrete implementation of CookieHandler, which separates the storage of cookies from the policy surrounding accepting and rejecting cookies. A CookieManager is initialized with a CookieStore which manages storage, and a CookiePolicy object, which makes policy decisions on cookie acceptance/rejection.
trans-unit.target: CookieManager提供了 CookieHandler 的具体实现，该实现将cookie的存储与围绕接受和拒绝cookie的策略分开。那么CookieManager初始化为 CookieStore 负责管理存储和 CookiePolicy 对象，这使得上的cookie接受/拒绝决策。

trans-unit.source: CookiePolicy
trans-unit.target: CookiePolicy

trans-unit.source: CookiePolicy implementations decide which cookies should be accepted and which should be rejected.
trans-unit.target: CookiePolicy的实现决定了哪些Cookie应该被接受,哪些应该被拒绝。

trans-unit.source: CookiePolicy implementations decide which cookies should be accepted and which should be rejected. Three pre-defined policy implementations are provided, namely ACCEPT_ALL, ACCEPT_NONE and ACCEPT_ORIGINAL_SERVER.
trans-unit.target: CookiePolicy实现决定了哪些Cookie应该被接受,哪些应该被拒绝。我们提供了三个预定义的策略实现,即ACCEPT_ALL、ACCEPT_NONE和ACCEPT_ORIGINAL_SERVER。

trans-unit.source: CookiePolicy.shouldAccept will be called by CookieManager.put to see whether or not one cookie should be accepted and put into cookie store. User can use any of three pre-defined CookiePolicy, namely ACCEPT_ALL, ACCEPT_NONE and ACCEPT_ORIGINAL_SERVER, or user can define his own CookiePolicy implementation and tell CookieManager to use it.
trans-unit.target: CookiePolicy.shouldAccept将被CookieManager.put调用,以查看是否应该接受一个cookie并将其放入cookie存储中。用户可以使用三个预先定义的CookiePolicy中的任何一个,即ACCEPT_ALL、ACCEPT_NONE和ACCEPT_ORIGINAL_SERVER,或者用户可以定义自己的CookiePolicy实现并告诉CookieManager使用它。

trans-unit.source: Coordinate Spaces
trans-unit.target: 坐标空间

trans-unit.source: Coordinates are infinitely thin and lie between the pixels of the output device. Operations that draw the outline of a figure operate by traversing an infinitely thin path between pixels with a pixel-sized pen that hangs down and to the right of the anchor point on the path. Operations that fill a figure operate by filling the interior of that infinitely thin path. Operations that render horizontal text render the ascending portion of character glyphs entirely above the baseline coordinate.
trans-unit.target: 坐标是无限细的,位于输出设备的像素之间。绘制图形轮廓的操作,是用像素大小的笔在像素之间穿越一条无限细的路径,该笔垂在路径上锚点的右边。填充图形的操作是通过填充该无限细路径的内部来进行的。渲染水平文本的操作,将字符字形的上升部分完全渲染在基线坐标之上。

trans-unit.source: Coordinates in device space usually refer to individual device pixels and are aligned on the infinitely thin gaps between these pixels. Some Graphics2D objects can be used to capture rendering operations for storage into a graphics metafile for playback on a concrete device of unknown physical resolution at a later time. Since the resolution might not be known when the rendering operations are captured, the Graphics2D Transform is set up to transform user coordinates to a virtual device space that approximates the expected resolution of the target device. Further transformations might need to be applied at playback time if the estimate is incorrect.
trans-unit.target: 设备空间中的坐标通常指的是单个设备像素，并在这些像素之间的无限细间隙上对齐。一些 Graphics2D 对象可用于捕获渲染操作，以存储到图形图元文件中，以便以后在未知物理分辨率的具体设备上播放。由于捕获渲染操作时可能不知道分辨率，因此将 Graphics2D Transform 设置为将用户坐标转换为近似于目标设备预期分辨率的虚拟设备空间。如果估计不正确，则可能需要在回放时应用进一步的转换。

trans-unit.source: Copies all of the attribute name-value mappings from the specified Attributes to this Map.

trans-unit.source: Copies all of the attribute name-value mappings from the specified Attributes to this Map. Duplicate mappings will be replaced.

trans-unit.target: 将一个列表中的所有元素复制到另一个列表中。

trans-unit.source: Copies all of the elements from one list into another. After the operation, the index of each copied element in the destination list will be identical to its index in the source list. The destination list must be at least as long as the source list. If it is longer, the remaining elements in the destination list are unaffected.
trans-unit.target: 将一个列表中的所有元素复制到另一个列表中。操作后,目标列表中每个被复制元素的索引将与源列表中的索引相同。目标列表必须至少与源列表一样长。如果它更长,目标列表中的其余元素将不受影响。

trans-unit.source: Copies all of the elements from one list into another. After the operation, the index of each copied element in the destination list will be identical to its index in the source list. The destination list's size must be greater than or equal to the source list's size. If it is greater, the remaining elements in the destination list are unaffected.
trans-unit.target: 将一个列表中的所有元素复制到另一个列表中。操作后,目标列表中每个被复制元素的索引将与源列表中的索引相同。目标列表的大小必须大于或等于源列表的大小。如果大于,目标列表中的其余元素将不受影响。

trans-unit.source: Copies all of the mappings from the specified map to this map (optional operation). The effect of this call is equivalent to that of calling put(k, v) on this map once for each mapping from key k to value v in the specified map. The behavior of this operation is undefined if the specified map is modified while the operation is in progress.
trans-unit.target: 将所有映射从指定映射复制到此映射（可选操作）。对于从指定映射中的键 k 到值 v 的每个映射，此调用的效果等效于在此映射上调用一次 put(k, v) 。如果在操作进行过程中修改了指定的映射，则此操作的行为是不确定的。

trans-unit.source: Copies all of the mappings from the specified map to this map (optional operation). The effect of this call is equivalent to that of calling put(k, v) on this map once for each mapping from key k to value v in the specified map. The behavior of this operation is undefined if the specified map is modified while the operation is in progress.
trans-unit.target: 将所有映射从指定映射复制到此映射（可选操作）。对于从指定映射中的键 k 到值 v 的每个映射，此调用的效果等效于在此映射上调用一次 put(k, v) 。如果在操作进行过程中修改了指定的映射，则此操作的行为是不确定的。

trans-unit.source: Copies an area of the component by a distance specified by dx and dy.
trans-unit.target: 按照 dx 和 dy 指定的距离复制组件的区域。

trans-unit.source: Copies an area of the component by a distance specified by dx and dy. From the point specified by x and y, this method copies downwards and to the right. To copy an area of the component to the left or upwards, specify a negative value for dx or dy. If a portion of the source rectangle lies outside the bounds of the component, or is obscured by another window or component, copyArea will be unable to copy the associated pixels. The area that is omitted can be refreshed by calling the component's paint method.
trans-unit.target: 按照 dx 和 dy 指定的距离复制组件的区域。从 x 和 y 指定的点开始，此方法向下和向右复制。要将组件的某个区域向左或向上复制，请为 dx 或 dy 指定一个负值。如果源矩形的一部分位于组件的边界之外，或者被另一个窗口或组件遮挡，则 copyArea 将无法复制关联的像素。可以通过调用组件的 paint 方法来刷新省略的区域。

trans-unit.source: Copies an array from the specified source array, beginning at the specified position, to the specified position of the destination array.
trans-unit.target: 从指定的源数组中复制一个数组,从指定的位置开始,复制到目标数组的指定位置。

trans-unit.source: Copies an array from the specified source array, beginning at the specified position, to the specified position of the destination array. A subsequence of array components are copied from the source array referenced by src to the destination array referenced by dest. The number of components copied is equal to the length argument. The components at positions srcPos through srcPos+length-1 in the source array are copied into positions destPos through destPos+length-1, respectively, of the destination array.
trans-unit.target: 从指定的源数组（从指定位置开始）复制数组到目标数组的指定位置。数组组件的子序列从 src 引用的源数组复制到 dest 引用的目标数组。复制的组件数等于 length 参数。在位置的部件 srcPos 通过 srcPos+length-1 的源阵列中的被复制到的位置 destPos 通过 destPos+length-1 ，分别，目标数组的。

trans-unit.source: Copies characters from this string into the destination byte array. Each byte receives the 8 low-order bits of the corresponding character. The eight high-order bits of each character are not copied and do not participate in the transfer in any way.
trans-unit.target: 将此字符串中的字符复制到目标字节数组中。每个字节接收相应字符的8个低阶位。每个字符的8个高阶位不被复制,也不以任何方式参与传输。

trans-unit.source: Copies characters from this string into the destination character array.
trans-unit.target: 将此字符串中的字符复制到目标字符数组中。

trans-unit.source: Copies into the specified array every active thread in the current thread's thread group and its subgroups.
trans-unit.target: 将当前线程的线程组及其子组中的每个活动线程复制到指定数组中。

trans-unit.source: Copies into the specified array every active thread in the current thread's thread group and its subgroups. This method simply invokes the ThreadGroup.enumerate(Thread[]) method of the current thread's thread group.
trans-unit.target: 将当前线程的线程组及其子组中的每个活动线程复制到指定的数组中。此方法仅调用当前线程的线程组的 ThreadGroup.enumerate(Thread[]) 方法。

trans-unit.source: Copies into the specified array every active thread in the current thread's thread group and its subgroups. This method simply invokes the ThreadGroup.enumerate(Thread[]) method of the current thread's thread group.
trans-unit.target: 将当前线程的线程组及其子组中的每个活动线程复制到指定的数组中。此方法仅调用当前线程的线程组的 ThreadGroup.enumerate(Thread[]) 方法。

trans-unit.source: Copies into the specified array every active thread in this thread group and its subgroups.
trans-unit.target: 将本线程组及其子组中的每个活动线程复制到指定的数组中。

trans-unit.source: Copies into the specified array every active thread in this thread group.
trans-unit.target: 将该线程组中的每个活动线程复制到指定的数组中。

trans-unit.source: Copies into the specified array every active thread in this thread group. If recurse is true, this method recursively enumerates all subgroups of this thread group and references to every active thread in these subgroups are also included. If the array is too short to hold all the threads, the extra threads are silently ignored.
trans-unit.target: 将此线程组中的每个活动线程复制到指定的数组中。如果 recurse 为 true ，则此方法递归枚举此线程组的所有子组，并且还包括对这些子组中每个活动线程的引用。如果数组太短而无法容纳所有线程，则多余的线程将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Copies into the specified array references to every active subgroup in this thread group and its subgroups.
trans-unit.target: 将本线程组及其子组中每个活动子组的引用复制到指定的数组中。

trans-unit.source: Copies into the specified array references to every active subgroup in this thread group.
trans-unit.target: 将这个线程组中每个活动子组的引用复制到指定的数组中。

trans-unit.source: Copies into the specified array references to every active subgroup in this thread group. If recurse is true, this method recursively enumerates all subgroups of this thread group and references to every active thread group in these subgroups are also included.
trans-unit.target: 复制到该线程组中每个活动子组的指定数组引用。如果 recurse 为 true ，则此方法递归枚举此线程组的所有子组，并且还包括对这些子组中每个活动线程组的引用。

trans-unit.source: Copies pixels from Raster srcRaster to this WritableRaster.
trans-unit.target: 将Raster srcRaster的像素复制到这个WritableRaster。

trans-unit.source: Copies pixels from Raster srcRaster to this WritableRaster. Each pixel in srcRaster is copied to the same x,y address in this raster, unless the address falls outside the bounds of this raster. srcRaster must have the same number of bands as this WritableRaster. The copy is a simple copy of source samples to the corresponding destination samples.
trans-unit.target: 从栅格 srcRaster 复制像素到这个可写栅格。srcRaster 中的每一个像素都会被复制到这个栅格中相同的 x,y 地址,除非这个地址在这个栅格的范围之外。srcRaster 的频带数量必须与这个可写栅格相同。复制是将源样本简单地复制到相应的目标样本。

trans-unit.source: Copies pixels from Raster srcRaster to this WritableRaster. For each (x, y) address in srcRaster, the corresponding pixel is copied to address (x+dx, y+dy) in this WritableRaster, unless (x+dx, y+dy) falls outside the bounds of this raster. srcRaster must have the same number of bands as this WritableRaster. The copy is a simple copy of source samples to the corresponding destination samples. For details, see setRect(Raster).
trans-unit.target: 将像素从Raster srcRaster复制到此WritableRaster。对于srcRaster中的每个（x，y）地址，除非（x + dx，y + dy）不在此栅格的边界内，否则将相应的像素复制到此WritableRaster中的地址（x + dx，y + dy）。srcRaster的波段数必须与此WritableRaster相同。该副本是源样本到相应目标样本的简单副本。有关详细信息，请参见 setRect(Raster) 。

trans-unit.source: Copies the components of this vector into the specified array.
trans-unit.target: 将此向量的成分复制到指定的数组中。

trans-unit.source: Copies the components of this vector into the specified array. The item at index k in this vector is copied into component k of anArray.
trans-unit.target: 将此向量的分量复制到指定的数组中。此向量中索引为 k 的项目被复制到 anArray 的组件 k 中。

trans-unit.source: Copies the key/values in elements AttributeSet into set.
trans-unit.target: 将 element AttributeSet中的键/值复制到 set 中。

trans-unit.source: Copies the key/values in elements AttributeSet into set. This does not copy component, icon, or element names attributes. Subclasses may wish to refine what is and what isn't copied here. But be sure to first remove all the attributes that are in set.
trans-unit.target: 将 element AttributeSet中的键/值复制到 set 中。这不会复制组件，图标或元素名称属性。子类可能希望优化此处复制的内容和不复制的内容。但是请确保首先删除 set 中的所有属性。

trans-unit.source: Copies the selected region and place its contents into the system clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 复制所选区域并将其内容放入系统剪贴板。

trans-unit.source: Copies the specified array, truncating or padding with false (if necessary) so the copy has the specified length.
trans-unit.target: 复制指定的数组，使用 false 截断或填充（如有必要），因此副本具有指定的长度。

trans-unit.source: Copies the specified array, truncating or padding with false (if necessary) so the copy has the specified length. For all indices that are valid in both the original array and the copy, the two arrays will contain identical values. For any indices that are valid in the copy but not the original, the copy will contain false. Such indices will exist if and only if the specified length is greater than that of the original array.
trans-unit.target: 复制指定的数组，使用 false 截断或填充（如有必要），因此副本具有指定的长度。对于在原始数组和副本中均有效的所有索引，两个数组将包含相同的值。对于副本中有效但原始索引无效的任何索引，副本将包含 false 。当且仅当指定长度大于原始数组的长度时，此类索引才会存在。

trans-unit.source: Copies the specified array, truncating or padding with null characters (if necessary) so the copy has the specified length.
trans-unit.target: 复制指定的数组,用空字符截断或填充(如果需要),使副本具有指定的长度。

trans-unit.source: Copies the specified array, truncating or padding with null characters (if necessary) so the copy has the specified length. For all indices that are valid in both the original array and the copy, the two arrays will contain identical values. For any indices that are valid in the copy but not the original, the copy will contain '\\u000'. Such indices will exist if and only if the specified length is greater than that of the original array.
trans-unit.target: 复制指定的数组，使用空字符截断或填充（如有必要），因此副本具有指定的长度。对于在原始数组和副本中均有效的所有索引，两个数组将包含相同的值。对于副本中有效但原始索引无效的任何索引，副本将包含 '\\u000' 。当且仅当指定长度大于原始数组的长度时，此类索引才会存在。

trans-unit.source: Copies the specified array, truncating or padding with null characters (if necessary) so the copy has the specified length. For all indices that are valid in both the original array and the copy, the two arrays will contain identical values. For any indices that are valid in the copy but not the original, the copy will contain '\u0000'. Such indices will exist if and only if the specified length is greater than that of the original array.
trans-unit.target: 复制指定的数组，使用空字符截断或填充（如有必要），因此副本具有指定的长度。对于在原始数组和副本中均有效的所有索引，两个数组将包含相同的值。对于在副本中有效但在原始副本中无效的任何索引，副本将包含 '\u0000' 。当且仅当指定长度大于原始数组的长度时，此类索引才会存在。

trans-unit.source: Copies the specified array, truncating or padding with nulls (if necessary) so the copy has the specified length.
trans-unit.target: 复制指定的数组,截断或填充空值(如果需要),使副本具有指定的长度。

trans-unit.source: Copies the specified array, truncating or padding with nulls (if necessary) so the copy has the specified length. For all indices that are valid in both the original array and the copy, the two arrays will contain identical values. For any indices that are valid in the copy but not the original, the copy will contain null. Such indices will exist if and only if the specified length is greater than that of the original array. The resulting array is of exactly the same class as the original array.
trans-unit.target: 复制指定的数组，截断或填充为空（如果需要），以便副本具有指定的长度。对于在原始数组和副本中均有效的所有索引，两个数组将包含相同的值。对于副本中有效但原始索引无效的任何索引，副本将包含 null 。当且仅当指定长度大于原始数组的长度时，此类索引才会存在。所得数组与原始数组具有完全相同的类。

trans-unit.source: Copies the specified array, truncating or padding with nulls (if necessary) so the copy has the specified length. For all indices that are valid in both the original array and the copy, the two arrays will contain identical values. For any indices that are valid in the copy but not the original, the copy will contain null. Such indices will exist if and only if the specified length is greater than that of the original array. The resulting array is of the class newType.
trans-unit.target: 复制指定的数组，截断或使用null填充（如果需要），以便副本具有指定的长度。对于在原始数组和副本中均有效的所有索引，两个数组将包含相同的值。对于副本中有效但原始索引无效的任何索引，副本将包含 null 。当且仅当指定长度大于原始数组的长度时，此类索引才会存在。生成的数组属于 newType 类。

trans-unit.source: Copies the specified array, truncating or padding with zeros (if necessary) so the copy has the specified length.
trans-unit.target: 复制指定的数组,截断或填充零(如果需要),使复制的数组具有指定的长度。

trans-unit.source: Copies the specified array, truncating or padding with zeros (if necessary) so the copy has the specified length. For all indices that are valid in both the original array and the copy, the two arrays will contain identical values. For any indices that are valid in the copy but not the original, the copy will contain (byte)0. Such indices will exist if and only if the specified length is greater than that of the original array.
trans-unit.target: 复制指定的数组，截断或填充零（如果需要），以便副本具有指定的长度。对于在原始数组和副本中均有效的所有索引，两个数组将包含相同的值。对于副本中有效但原始索引无效的任何索引，副本将包含 (byte)0 。当且仅当指定长度大于原始数组的长度时，此类索引才会存在。

For any indices that are valid in the copy but not the original, the copy will contain (short)0.
